channel.title: Milestone 2 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: For this milestone, you will be creating additional classes to represent the entrées, and drinks served at “Dogs ‘N Such”, and refactoring some of your existing classes to take advantage of polymorphism. These will be created within the Data project of the solution you accepted from GitHub classroom. General requirements: You need to follow the style laid out in the C# Coding Conventions Create classes that reflect the specifications given below
